item.title: Tonight I Can Write
item.description: Tonight I can write the saddest lines. Write, for example, The night is shattered, and the blue stars shiver in the distance. The night wind revolves in the sky and sings. Tonight I can write the saddest lines. I loved her, and sometimes she loved me too. Through nights like this one I held her in my arms. I kissed her again and again under the endless sky. She loved me, and sometimes I loved her too.
